TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Improves All Terrain Inside Cultural Borders[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][TAB]Technically, the Eden Project is the world's largest greenhouse located near the town of St Austell in England. The complex comprises a number of domes that house plant species from around the world, with each emulating a natural biome. The domes are made out of hundreds of hexagons plus a few pentagons that interconnect the whole construction together; each of these is a transparent cushion made of tough plastic. The first dome emulates a tropical environment, the second a warm temperate, Mediterranean environment.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][TAB]In Civ, the idea is taken a step further as a global attempt to improve the planet. As such, completing the project will improve the terrain in the cultural borders of your empire by one level. Terrain upgrades occur as:[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Desert - Plains - Grassland - Forest[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Snow - Tundra - Plains[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Ocean - Coast
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Améliore tous les terrains de nos frontières d'un niveau[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][TAB]Techniquement , le projet Eden est la plus grande Maison de l'environnement située près de la ville de St Austell en Angleterre. Ce complexe comprend un nombre important de domes qui abritent des espèces végétales de toute la terre, chacun simulant un environnement particulier. Les domes sont constitués de centaines d'hexagones, ainsi que quelques pentagones reliant la construction ; ces éléments sont fabriqués de plastics dure. Le premier Dome simule un environnement tropical, le second un milieu chaud tempéré,...[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][TAB]Dans Civ, l'idée est portée un peu plus loin, comme une tentative globale d'améliorer l aplanète. Ainsi, terminer le projet améliorera les terrains de toutes les villes controllées de votre empire. Améliorations appliquées à :[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Désert - Plaine - Prairie[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Neige - Tundra - Prairie[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Océan - Côte
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Verbessert alle Geländefelder innerhalb der kulturellen Grenzen um eine Stufe[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][TAB]Technisch gesehen ist das Eden-Projekt das größte Gewächshaus der Welt in der Nähe der Stadt St. Austell in England. Der Komplex besteht aus einer Reihe von Kuppeln, die Pflanzenarten der ganzen Welt beinhalten und jeweils ein natürliches Biom nachstellen. Die Kuppeln bestehen aus hunderten von Sechsecken und einigen Fünfecken, die die ganze Konstruktion miteinander verbinden; jedes einzelne besteht aus einem transparenten Kissen aus zähem Plastik. Die erste Kuppel emuliert die Tropen, die zweite eine warm-gemäßigte, mittelmeerische Umwelt. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][TAB]Civ geht einen Schritt weiter zu einem globalen Versuch, den Planeten zu verbessern. Dabei wird die Vollendung des Projektes das Terrain aller von Deinem Imperium kontrollierten Städte verbessern. Folgende Geländeverbesserungen treten auf:[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Wüste - Ebene - Grasland[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Eis - Tundra - Grasland[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Ozean - Küste
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Improves All Terrain in Cultural Borders by One Level[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][TAB]Technically, the Eden Project is the world's largest greenhouse located near the town of St Austell in England. The complex comprises a number of domes that house plant species from around the world, with each emulating a natural biome. The domes are made out of hundreds of hexagons plus a few pentagons that interconnect the whole construction together; each of these is a transparent cushion made of tough plastic. The first dome emulates a tropical environment, the second a warm temperate, Mediterranean environment.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][TAB]In Civ, the idea is taken a step further as a global attempt to improve the planet. As such, completing the project will improve the terrain in all city controlled areas of your empire. Terrain Upgrades occur as:[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Desert - Plain - Grassland[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Snow - Tundra - Grassland[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Ocean - Coast
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Improves All Terrain in Cultural Borders by One Level[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][TAB]Technically, the Eden Project is the world's largest greenhouse located near the town of St Austell in England. The complex comprises a number of domes that house plant species from around the world, with each emulating a natural biome. The domes are made out of hundreds of hexagons plus a few pentagons that interconnect the whole construction together; each of these is a transparent cushion made of tough plastic. The first dome emulates a tropical environment, the second a warm temperate, Mediterranean environment.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][TAB]In Civ, the idea is taken a step further as a global attempt to improve the planet. As such, completing the project will improve the terrain in all city controlled areas of your empire. Terrain Upgrades occur as:[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Desert - Plain - Grassland[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Snow - Tundra - Grassland[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Ocean - Coast

TEXT.English: Completing the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Eden Project[COLOR_REVERT] improves all terrain within your cultural borders by one level.
TEXT.French: Terminer le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Projet Eden[COLOR_REVERT] améliore tous les terrains à l'intérieur des frontières d'un niveau.
TEXT.German: Die Vollendung des [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Eden-Projektes[COLOR_REVERT] verbessert alle Geländefelder innerhalb Deiner kulturellen Grenzen um eine Stufe.
TEXT.Italian: Completing the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Eden Project[COLOR_REVERT] improves all terrain within your cultural borders by one level.
TEXT.Spanish: Completing the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Eden Project[COLOR_REVERT] improves all terrain within your cultural borders by one level.
